text: J'ai été vraiment déçue par la piètre qualité de la nourriture, surtout pour le prix qu'on a payé (4$ pour un petit plat de riz! chaque personne!). J'ai pris le Aloo Gobi et ce n'était pas très bon, pas particulièrement savoureux. Mon amie par contre, elle a aimé son plat. En tout cas, je ne reviendrai jamais ici .
I went there for a dinner and I think it was okay for buffet. The price is reasonable. I think in terms of quality and the price it is good.

I came here at the suggestion of my 2007 edition Lonely Planet, but I really should have left when I saw the empty dining room. The buffet counter was not very attentively maintained, even though it was only 7:45pm: there was naan bread so dry it was cracking, dried-out tandoor chicken and aloo gobhi, stale chicken pakora, excessively salty samosas, tasteless beef vindaloo, and a few other dishes that were similarly unremarkable and quite forgettable. Next time I find myself on this street, I'll just stick to Mango Bay.
